SYSTEM: Vadim.pdf: Página 9
November 12, 2015
9
Gravitation and Fitness in Ontology Dynamics
Focus and Assumptions
•
 
In our work:
–
 
Insights (so far) are taken from …
 
Newtonian Mechanics
–
 
In particular: the models are based on 
the Newton’s Law of Universal 
Gravitation
•
 
Differences 
(simplifications / complications):
–
 
Knowledge representations are 
discrete in their nature:
–
 
Continuous models -> discrete models
–
 
Objects are immaterial: 
–
 
Masses -> Fitnesses
